##  [ Gibson House and Property ](https://yoloarts.org/the-house-and-property/ "Gibson House and Property")

The Gibson House and Property serves as the county resource for the discovery of and engagement with the historic and evolving practice of regional arts and culture. The community is invited to explore a diverse arrangement of exhibitions, programs and community spaces offered on this landmark site.

[ Yolo County Historical Collection + ](https://yoloarts.org/historical-exhibitions/)

**Gibson House Open Hours**

Tuesdays and Thursdays | noon-4pm

Select Saturdays | 8:00am- 4:00pm (1/17, 2/21)

[ The Barn Gallery + ](https://yoloarts.org/the-barn-gallery/)

**The Barn Gallery Open Hours**

Tuesday - Thursday | 12:00-5:00pm

Saturdays | 12:00-3:00pm

##  [ Gallery 625 ](https://yoloarts.org/gallery-625/ "Gallery 625")

Gallery 625, curated by YoloArts, is committed to supporting the continual growth and development of the arts in Yolo County by providing space and opportunity for the exhibition of arts. The gallery provides a diverse selection of artistic mediums by emergent to established artists.

[ Gallery 625 + ](https://yoloarts.org/gallery-625/)

**Open Hours**  
Monday - Friday | 8am - 5pm

##  [ Administrative Offices ](https://yoloarts.org/about-us/ "Administrative Offices")

YoloArts offices are open by appointment only.

Email [ya@yoloarts.org](mailto:ya@yoloarts.org) to schedule.

# Welcome to YoloArts

At YoloArts, we are dedicated and determined to use the power of arts to strengthen and enrich our communities. We are continuing to develop new arts experiences in service to Yolo County.

##### [The Barn Gallery ](https://yoloarts.org/the-barn-gallery/)

##### [Give ](https://yoloarts.org/give/)

###### Events

## Our Mission

YoloArts is dedicated to cultivating and enriching people's lives through the arts. 

[](https://yoloarts.org/arts-education/)

* * *

Arts Education brings artists into the classroom to foster a creative community.

[ ](https://yoloarts.org/gallery-625/)

* * *

Gallery 625 provides space and opportunity for the exhibition of art.

[ ](https://yoloarts.org/yolo-community-band/)

* * *

Art in Public Places instills pride in the community landscape. 

[ ](https://yoloarts.org/art-ag-project/)

* * *

Art & Ag connects farmers, artists and the community in preserving agriculture.

[ ](https://yoloarts.org/via/)

* * *

Helping veterans find their voice, connect to the community and heal through the arts.

[ ](https://yoloarts.org/i-see-you-program/)

* * *

The I SEE YOU project uses art to encourage communication across social divides.

[ ](https://yoloarts.org/directory/)

* * *

Connecting artists with commissions and exhibition opportunities the Artist Directory is a free resource. 

[ ](https://yoloarts.org/professional-development/)

* * *
